Description: Rim and body fragment of East Greek pottery plate, probably North Ionian. Interior: stopt maeander on rim; palmette and billets preserved in outer frieze on floor; some added red.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. VII, no. 4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.682)
